name: La Trinidad
company_mentions: Oro Gold de Mexico, S.A. de C.V.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Mazatlan (https://www.juniorminingnetwork.com/junior-miner-news/press-releases/772-tsx-venture/mln/25706-marlin-gold-announces-operating-results-from-la-trinidad-mine.html). La Trinidad mine is located in Sinaloa, Mexico, and was declared commercial production on November 1, 2014. It ceased operations in 2019

owners: Oro Gold de Mexico, S.A. de C.V.
web_search_companies.notes: Marlin Gold Mining Ltd. owned the La Trinidad mine until it was acquired by GR Silver Mining. The mine is currently decommissioned.
